testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.description: Real results from real people. Discover how our platform changed thousands of fitness journeys.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: This platform completely changed my life! The personalized workout plans and supportive community helped me achieve what I thought was impossible. My coach was amazing and pushed me to be my best every day.

items.name: Mike Chen
items.text: As a busy professional, I needed flexibility in my training. The app scheduling and progress tracking kept me accountable. I went from struggling with 5K to completing my first marathon!

items.name: Emma Williams
items.text: The workout variety and the ability to reach my coach anytime made all the difference. I built strength, confidence, and lifelong healthy habits. Best decision I ever made!

items.name: David Martinez
items.text: From dad bod to fit dad! Nutrition guidance combined with effective workouts helped me lose 25 kg and gain muscle. My energy levels are so high and I feel 10 years younger!

faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.description: Get quick answers to the most common questions about FitnessHub. If you canâ€™t find what youâ€™re looking for, feel free to contact our support team.

0.question: What is FitnessHub?
0.answer: FitnessHub is an all-in-one fitness management platform that connects coaches, clients, and admins. We provide tools for progress tracking, workout scheduling, membership management, and more â€” all in one easy-to-use place.

1.question: How do I get started with FitnessHub?
1.answer: Getting started is easy! Just sign up for a free account, choose your role (client, coach, or admin), and complete your profile. Our team will guide you through the initial onboarding process and help you get the most out of the platform.

2.question: Is FitnessHub suitable for beginners?
2.answer: Absolutely! FitnessHub is designed for everyone, from beginners to professional athletes. Our coaches can create customized training programs that match your fitness level and goals, ensuring you get the right support at every step of your journey.

0.question: What membership plans are available?
0.answer: We offer three main membership plans: Plus ($29/month) for individuals, Professional ($79/month) for coaches, and Enterprise ($199/month) for gyms and organizations. All plans include access to core features, with additional features in higher tiers.

1.question: Can I change my membership plan later?
1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we prorate the difference based on your billing cycle. You wonâ€™t lose any data or progress when switching plans.

2.question: Is there any long-term commitment?
2.answer: No, all our plans are month-to-month with no long-term contracts. You can cancel anytime, and you wonâ€™t be charged for the next month. We also offer discounts for those who choose billing every 6 months or yearly.

0.question: How does personal training work?
0.answer: Our certified coaches create customized training programs based on your goals, fitness level, and preferences. Youâ€™ll receive detailed workouts with video tutorials, progress tracking, and regular support through our messaging system.

1.question: Can I switch coaches?
1.answer: Yes, youâ€™re free to switch coaches at any time. We want you to find the perfect coach for your style and goals. You can browse coach profiles, reviews, and specialties before deciding.

2.question: What if I miss a workout?
2.answer: No problem! Our platform gives you full flexibility to manage your schedule. You can reschedule workouts, and you can access all your previous workouts anytime. Your coach will help you get back on track without any judgment.

0.question: What payment methods are accepted?
0.answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, and American Express) as well as PayPal. All payments are secure and encrypted, and your payment info is stored safely for auto-renewal.

1.question: Are there any hidden fees?
1.answer: Not at all. The subscription price you see is what you pay â€” no setup fees, no cancellation fees, and no hidden costs. We believe in transparent, honest pricing so you know exactly what youâ€™re getting.

2.question: Can I get a refund?
2.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all plans. If youâ€™re not completely satisfied with FitnessHub in your first month, contact us and weâ€™ll refund you in full â€” no questions asked.

0.question: What devices does FitnessHub work on?
0.answer: FitnessHub is available on all devices â€” iOS, Android, and web. You can switch seamlessly between your phone, tablet, and computer, with all your data syncing automatically across devices.

1.question: What if I run into technical issues?
1.answer: Our technical support team is available 24/7 to help you. You can reach us via live chat, email, or phone, and weâ€™ll resolve any issue quickly. We aim to respond within two hours or less.

2.question: Is my data secure?
2.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption and follow industry standards for data protection. Your personal info, health data, and financial details are all encrypted and stored securely. We will never sell your data or share it with third parties.

tips.lighting: Use consistent, good lighting to keep results comparable.
tips.distance: Keep the same distance from the camera every time.
tips.angles: Stick to the same angles each time for more accurate comparison.
tips.cameraHeight: Set the camera roughly at mid-body height.
tips.timer: Use a timer to steady your pose and reduce shaking.
tips.clothes: Wear similar clothes to evaluate changes clearly.
tips.background: Choose a simple, consistent background as much as possible.
tips.frequency: Take photos periodically (e.g., weekly or every two weeks) depending on your goal.
